title: Self-attested list of S
clause_text: Self-attested list of S.No. / G.No. / CTS showing name of owner as per record of rights, total area of such land parcel, area owned by the applicant in such land parcel, the name of person / company owning the Development Rights, area proposed to be included in project from such land parcel.
section: Permission and Declaration of Project by State Government :-
